item.title: Flickr - How not to design backup userdata when shutting down your service
item.description: Happy New Year - 2019 It is always easy to find fault in a service. So this isn’t very hard for me.

item.title: Happy Teachers Day
item.description: This is a post I’m meaning to write for a very long time. I wanted to write this every year around Teachers day (5-Sep) and failed to publish.

item.title: Website redesign
item.description: Today I’m launching the redesigned website palaniraja.com. It’s a shame that I took to this much time to update my own website which I’ve paying for years.
